attributes.action: Remove Ecuador from the red travel list immediately
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government must explain to all Ecuadoreans living in the UK the reasons why Ecuador is still on the red list while other countries like Brazil, Argentina, Paraguay have been moved to the green list.

According to the World Health Organisation, on the 7th of October 2021, Ecuador reported only 363 new cases and around 67% of its population had the 2nd  vaccination dose administrated (vs Brazil 49%, Argentina 57%, Paraguay 31%)
attributes.background: The UK Government should urgently review its travel policy towards Ecuador based on its latest scientific data available, number of daily cases and vaccination rate of its population.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the similar action: 

Remove Ecuador from the red list:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597785
